Virtual Reality: A virtual reality game where players must work together to solve puzzles and overcome challenges in order to uncover the's birthday party.
Escape Room: An escape room where players must work together to solve puzzles and escape the room before the birthday party starts.
The Secret Birthday Party: A players are tasked with finding clues and solving puzzles in order to uncover the secret location of the birthday party.
The Surprise Birthday Party: A surprise birthday party where players must work together to plan and execute a surprise party for the Invisible.
The Invisible Guest: A party where the Invisible is the guest of honor and players must work together to make sure the party is a success despite the Invisible's invisibility.
